Title: Relates to permitting amendment of a claim or notice of intention to file a claim to correct jurisdictional pleading defects
Summary: Permits amendment of a claim or notice of intention to file a claim to correct jurisdictional pleading defects and the dismissal of a claim based upon claimant's failure to comply with jurisdictional pleading requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Ct Claims Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act, in relation to permitting amendment of a claim or notice of intention to file a claim to correct jurisdictional pleading defects and to provide for a procedure for the dismissal of a claim based upon claimant's failure to comply with jurisdictional pleading requirements
